DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim determine effect 16 week aerobic interval training quality life set clinical biomarkers .
DOC.detailed_description: Besides traditional metabolic syndrome risk factor ( dyslipidemia , raise blood pressure , central obesity dysglycemia ) subclinical disorder relate chronic inflammation cell damage report metabolic syndrome . Therefore , regard systemic feature metabolic syndrome , investigate new approach aerobic interval train several clinical biomarkers widely use . Such training use differs current aerobic protocol order attenuate metabolic musculoskeletal overload untrained unhealthy subject .
DOC.criteria: Having metabolic syndrome accord international diabetes foundation definition ( IDF ) . Age 35 60 year untrained subject . Musculotendinous osteoarticular injury low limb and/or spine Chronic pulmonary disease Neurological disorder Kidney failure Highrisk cardiovascular disease ( Unstable angina pectoris , Uncompensated heart failure , complex ventricular arrhythmia myocardial infarction last month ) .
